title: Research data quality: progress-message, summary-message, empty-content
description: Analyze samples of progress-message, summary-message, empty-content. For each type: extract samples, score relevance, recommend handling strategy.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Paper 1 (progress-message): Extract 5+ samples of 'progress-message' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 1 (progress-message): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 2 (summary-message): Extract 5+ samples of 'summary-message' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 2 (summary-message): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 3 (empty-content): Extract 5+ samples of 'empty-content' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 3 (empty-content): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
